description: Request to anonymize one or more closed circulation requests by removing personally identifiable information

requestIds.description: Array of request UUIDs to be anonymized. All requests must have a closed status.

items.description: UUID of a request to anonymize

includeCirculationLogs.description: Whether to anonymize circulation logs associated with these requests. When true, existing circulation log entries will have userBarcode set to '-' and a new anonymization log entry will be created. Defaults to true if not specified.
